Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers shot 50% (3,580/7,176) last season -- T-2nd-best in the NBA; the Pistons allowed opponents to shoot 49% last season -- 7th-worst in the NBA.
The Pistons allowed 15.4 offensive rebounds/game last season -- 5th-best in the NBA; the Lakers averaged 14.1 offensive rebounds per game last season -- 2nd-worst in the NBA.
